channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6789, MT6855, MT6879, MT6895, MT6983
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6789, MT6855, MT6879, MT6895, MT6983

item.title: CVE-2022-26474|2024-08-03T05:03:32.875Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6789%2C%20mt6855%2C%20mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In sensorhub, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect calculation of buffer size. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07129717; Issue ID: ALPS07129717.

item.title: CVE-2022-26455|2024-08-03T05:03:32.766Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6789%2C%20mt6855%2C%20mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983
item.description: In gz, there is a possible memory corruption due to incorrect error handling. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07177858; Issue ID: ALPS07177858.
